pr_title: motherlode: Add overlay for broken water wheel struts

timeline.message:
motherlode: Add overlay for broken water wheel struts

When strut is broken, red border with hammer icon will show around it.

motherlode: Add overlay for broken water wheel struts

When strut is broken, red border with hammer icon will show around it.

timeline.bodyText: This can't be null when overlays are rendering.

Adam-

@@ -125,9 +125,9 @@ public interface MotherlodeConfig extends Config
 	}
 
 	@ConfigItem(
-			keyName = "showBrokenStruts",
-			name = "Show broken struts",
-			description = "Shows broken water wheel struts"

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure if this really happens or not, but if it does, it isn't correct as it would not remove the rocks whenever they change into something else.
timeline.author: Adam-

timeline.message:
motherlode: Add overlay for broken water wheel struts

When strut is broken, red border with hammer icon will show around it.

timeline.bodyText:
gameObject is only used once now. Change this to
addGameObject(event.getGameObject());
timeline.author: Nightfirecat
Nightfirecat

timeline.bodyText: You could probably just rename the RocksOverlay to MotherlodeSceneOverlay and then put this in there aswell since it looks very similar.
timeline.author: Adam-
